channel.title: Help with my source
channel.description:
my first question is when i try to compile with the compile all.bat i get javac is not recognized as an internal or external command. How can i fix this?
and my second question is how can i make a shop like actually insert it ingame i have the npc and CFG file set up. does it have anything to do with a java file?

item.title: Help with my source
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

tonypker13:

Right click your compile and press edit. There’s a line that has JDK, change it to your version.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my source
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Look around for the TuT. If it’s not here, there’s other sites.
Right click your compile and press edit. There’s a line that has JDK, change it to your version.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my source
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

right click your compiler, and click edit

replace your compile code with this

@echo off title 'Perfect Compiler' 2.0 if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. echo If the site does not show up, please go to: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Used %p% to compile your files! pause exit

Read full topic
